did.unittitle: Volume of school work by students at Holy Cross School
did.abstract: A bound volume of school work by several students at the Holy Cross School in the Flatbush neighborhood of Brooklyn. The volume was created to commemorate the Columbian Exposition in Chicago in 1893.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single item.
